long_description: Dive deep into the sea in search of lost treasures or go exploring high in the mountains with the waterproof Princeton Tec League 100 flashlight. A single high-quality Maxbright LED outputs 210 lumens and throws a bright white beam 181m (594 ft.). Princeton Tec level 3 waterproof protection is equivalent to the IPX8 standard and provides waterproof integrity for continual submersion in water down to 100m (328 ft.). Sculpted shape fits comfortably in your hand. 4 AA batteries, included, provide up to 10 hrs. of use.
short_description: Dive deep into the sea in search of lost treasures or go exploring high in the mountains with the waterproof Princeton Tec League 100 flashlight.
